meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cephalothin to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: Cephalothin is effective against a wide range of bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the mighty cephalothin!
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed cephalthin like a shield against the invading bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The cephalthin worked tirelessly to combat the bacterial invaders.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of cephalthin in detail.
meanings.sent2: Cephalthin has a complex molecular formula.
meanings.sent3: The students marveled at the intricate makeup of cephalthin.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, cephalthin appeared like a tiny puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The chemical composition of cephalthin fascinated the researchers.
